risks.description: Additional features and requirements added during project execution
risks.mitigation_strategy: Strict change control process, stakeholder education on impact of scope changes

risks.description: Loss of critical team member due to resignation or illness
risks.impact_description: 25% reduction in team velocity for 3 sprints
risks.mitigation_strategy: Knowledge sharing, documentation, pair programming, succession planning

risks.description: Unexpected complexity in integrating third-party services or internal systems
risks.mitigation_strategy: Early integration testing, technical spikes for complex integrations

risks.description: External API or service provider experiences delays or changes
risks.mitigation_strategy: Mock services for testing, alternative provider identification

risks.description: Critical security vulnerability found requiring immediate remediation
risks.impact_description: Additional $20,000 for security audit and fixes
risks.mitigation_strategy: Regular security audits, security training, secure coding practices

risks.description: Cloud service outages or infrastructure reliability issues
risks.mitigation_strategy: Multi-region deployment, backup systems, disaster recovery planning

risks.description: Rapid accumulation of technical debt reducing team effectiveness
risks.mitigation_strategy: Dedicated refactoring time, code review standards, automated testing

risks.description: Unclear or changing requirements leading to rework
risks.mitigation_strategy: Story refinement sessions, acceptance criteria definition, stakeholder involvement

risk_response_strategies.avoidance: Eliminate risk by changing project approach
risk_response_strategies.mitigation: Reduce probability or impact through proactive measures
risk_response_strategies.transfer: Shift risk to third party (insurance, outsourcing)
risk_response_strategies.acceptance: Acknowledge risk and develop contingency plan
